flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: By modifying a kite to hold an accelerometer and programming an Arduino to play tones based on the accelerometer's input, we have SPEAKR! (Singing Portable Electronic Arduino Kite-Remix!).  If the virtual world had wind, this is what it would sound like.
guide.title: SPEAKR!
